lead_paragraph: WALLACE--Carole, 85. Beloved mother of Morris Effron (Dawn) and Dani Kline (David). Loving grandmother to Jacob, Matthew, Aaron and Zoe. Culture, friends and family filled her with life. Donations in her honor to Planned Parenthood. 1/3
